sig_info: While in Freestyle combat form, performing a Medium hit followed by a Light, Light, Light and Medium combo inflicts 4.15 to 23.22 Direct Damage per blow.
While in Acrobatic combat form, Blocking an attack followed by a Medium, Light, Light, Medium combo Regenerates 3.2 to 17.92 Health per move.
Successfully completing a Freestyle combo increases Beast's Critical Rating by 84.21 for 5 seconds.
Successfully completing an Acrobatic combo causes opponents to get 50% less Power when getting hit and attacking for 5 seconds.
When unsuccessfully performing a combo, there will be a 5 second delay before you can start a new combo.

PASSIVE: Beast's thick hide makes him resistant to Bleed effects, decreasing their Potency and Duration by 65%.
When starting the battle with more than 50% Health, Beast employs a Freestyle combat form; Critical hits have a 60% chance to inflict 58.1 Bleed damage over 4 seconds.

When starting the battle with less than 50% health, Beast employs an Acrobatic combat form. This grants him a 85% chance when receiving Physical Critical Hits to reduce their Critical Damage by 85%. Additionally, the opponent gets 55% less Power when getting hit by Beast.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Beast analyses the situation and employs a Freestyle combat form.
55% chance to Stun for 1.50 second(s).
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: Using his impressive power of deductive reasoning, Beast decides that employing an Acrobatic combat form is essential to his survival.
80% chance to Stun for 2.50 second(s).
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Increases Attack by 2.49 per hit in the combo meter, up to a maximum of 150% total Attack increase.

When starting the battle with less than 50% health, Beast employs an Acrobatic combat form. This grants him a 85% chance when receiving Physical Critical Hits to reduce their Critical Damage by 85%. Additionally, the opponent gets 55% less Power when getting hit by Beast.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: Beast analyses the situation and employs a Freestyle combat form.
55% chance to Stun for 1.50 second(s).
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: Using his impressive power of deductive reasoning, Beast decides that employing an Acrobatic combat form is essential to his survival.
80% chance to Stun for 2.50 second(s).
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Increases Attack by 102.81 per hit in the combo meter, up to a maximum of 150% total Attack increase.
